Traits.Name: Shelter
Traits.Description: Adjacent allies get +1 accuracy on saves.

Actions.Name: Autocure
Actions.Description: May grant vigor 1 to a bloodied ally in range 3.

Actions.Name: Holy
Actions.Effect: Characters must save or become staggered or blinded (Zelaot's choice).

Actions.Name: Succor
Actions.Description: Target defeated ally, return them to life with the summon type and 25% max hp.

Actions.Name: Shield of Faith
Actions.Description: Allied character in range 3 becomes marked and resistant to all damage while marked. This mark ends if they are dazed, winded, staggered, or stunned, or the zealot uses this ability again.
